items.title: The Wiretap: Plagued By Child Predators, Former $200 Million Whisper App Has Disappeared
items.description: Whisper was once a darling of the Silicon Valley social boom. Not any more.

items.title: Mollick Presents The Meaning Of New Image Generation Models
items.description: The new tools for developing visuals are smarter “thinking” mode

items.title: Why Lifestyle Choices Could Determine Whether Or Not You Get Cancer
items.description: Nearly 2 in 5 cancers and about half of cancer deaths among adults 30 and up were tied to lifestyle factors, according to a recent study.

items.title: Samsung’s Major Free Android 15 Update Finally Arrives For Millions Of Galaxy Users
items.description: Months in the making, the release of One UI 7 with the goodness of Android 15 is almost here, but it’s not for everyone.

items.title: Building A Stronger Supply Chain: Why Trust Makes All The Difference
items.description: A "trust-based approach" can ensure a resilient supply chain that is adaptable to today’s—and tomorrow's—challenges.
